author: nflorian
title: Staying at The Pierre is a Love Affair.
text: Love the location, Love the staff, love the comfort, love the rooms. The Pierre is old world luxury with modern amenities It is located where everyone wants to be, facing the Central Park and on Fifth Avenue. Ivette Munroe's team of concierges can't do enough for you. It's a one stop shop for your sight seeing and your restaurant reservations. We decided on our next trip which is India to only stay in Taj Hotels because of our experience at The Pierre.
